NAME

META_SCALEVIEWPORTEXT

NEAREST API CALL

#include <windows.h>
BOOL32 ScaleViewportExtEx
(
	HDC32 hdc,
	INT32 xNum,
	INT32 xDenom,
	INT32 yNum,
	INT32 yDenom,
	LPSIZE32 size
);

DESCRIPTION

U16 Value
0 yDenom
1 yNum
2 xDenom
3 xNum
ScaleViewportExt resizes the width and height of the physical window by 
width = (width * xNum) / xDenom;
height = (height * yNum) / yDenom;
see this file for explanation.
